Utilities.Profiler.Profiler Class Reference

Object class used to profile a function. Create at the beginning of a function and it will automatically record the time. Note that this isn't exact and is based on when the object is destroyed (if stop isn't called first that is) which leaves it up to garbage collection... ie. call Stop... More...

Detailed Description

Object class used to profile a function. Create at the beginning of a function and it will automatically record the time. Note that this isn't exact and is based on when the object is destroyed (if stop isn't called first that is) which leaves it up to garbage collection... ie. call Stop...
